fields.name: .cards > ul > li > .cards-card-image img
fields.label: Card Image
fields.description: Image for the card. Will be optimized automatically.

fields.name: .cards > ul > li > .cards-card-body p
fields.label: Card Body
fields.description: Card content text. Supports basic formatting.

fields.name: .cards > ul > li > .cards-card-body a
fields.label: Card Link
fields.description: Optional link URL for the card

fields.name: .cards > ul > li > .cards-card-body a
fields.label: Card Link Text
fields.description: Text for the card link button

fields.name: class
fields.label: Number of Columns
fields.description: Select the number of columns for the layout. Applied automatically based on content.

fields.name: .columns > div > div
fields.label: Column Content
fields.description: Content for each column. Can include text, images, and links.

fields.name: data-footer-path
fields.label: Footer Fragment Path
fields.description: Path to the footer fragment. Defaults to /footer if not specified. Set via page metadata 'footer' property.

fields.name: data-nav-path
fields.label: Navigation Fragment Path
fields.description: Path to the navigation fragment. Defaults to /nav if not specified. Set via page metadata 'nav' property.

fields.name: .hero picture img
fields.label: Hero Background Image
fields.description: Background image for the hero section. Will be positioned absolutely to cover the entire hero area.

fields.name: .hero h1
fields.label: Hero Heading
fields.description: Main heading text for the hero banner. Displayed with high contrast over the background image.

fields.name: .hero p
fields.label: Hero Description
fields.description: Optional description or subtitle text for the hero section.

fields.name: data-min-height
fields.label: Minimum Height (px)
fields.description: Minimum height for the hero section in pixels. Default is 300px.
